description:
An ultra-light axe for technical mountaineering and steep skiing. The gently curved shaft plunges well and allows a wee bit of clearance over bulges.

  • Steel head with compact hammer
  • Banana-shaped pick is tapered to 3mm for efficient penetration and easy unhooking
  • Durable beveled spike aids plunging
  • Includes the Trigrest handrest, which is adjustable without tools
  • Compatible with weights for a better swing (not included)
  • Compact 45cm length is easy to store in your pack
name: Petzl Gully Hammer Ice Axe
